title: Ranked: Banning your teamates Champion
body: Too many times I've had people in champion select ban the champion i have pre-selected, can we please have like a warning, something like "A team mate has already selected this champion are you sure you want to ban" or something like that. It would make things so much easier.

replies.body:
I totally agree with "your teammate has select this champion are you sure you want to ban". Because sometimes people are just dense and alt tabbed and don't even realise. If they miss the banning phase because they weren't quick enough then they deserve that dodge anyway. They should pay attention.

If someone is still willing to ban a champion you have shadow picked then yes they're just toxic and you'll probably lose anyway.

i want all lee sin players under plat to understand that they are hot garbage, and that if they select him, i will instant ban him every time

so fuck that
Banning someone else's pick in ranked is kinda mean though. I just want to play zilean support and nobody lets me. I want to use my mastery 7 zilean...

generally this is your teammates being mean. I can never play zilean support even though I have mastery 7 for it and I'm very confident I can win lane with it in ranked, but  whenever I pick it it gets banned by my team. It's supposed to stop troll picks but I get so many threats from my teammates to play a 'meta' support and not useless support like zilean. I like zilean he feels strong and useful and he as a revive, it's amazing but nobody lets me play zilean. I do understand that tank supports are good and all and I can play tank supports but I also want to play zilean because I'm much better with zilean and I get so many threats for reports even if I do well. I am yet to have a game where I do badly with zilean.

It's happened to me a few times as well. On top of that I was first pick 90% of the time, so there was no chance of the enemy getting it before me.
AFK champ select players in general are starting to become a big peeve for me.
